articles.description: The seven-time Grammy winner spoke to Vogue about hating her body as a teen — and how she learned to embrace her perceived flaws with time.
articles.content:
Billie Eilish is opening up about the body image issues she dealt with as a teenager with the benefit of hindsight. 
The seven-time Grammy winner spoke to Vogue for the magazines first-ever video co… [+2445 chars]

articles.description: Ashley Olsen is a married woman! The 'Full House' star tied the knot with her longtime beau, artist Louis Eisner, in a private ceremony in Bel-Air, Page Six ...
